text: Labour took the most seats, and gained an overall majority Elections to the Kirkcaldy District Council took place in May 1988, alongside elections to the councils of Scotland's various other districts. The number of seats and the total vote share won by each party is listed below. Other parties received 1.9% of the vote. Voter turnout was 47.9%. ==References== Category: Fife Council elections Category:1988 Scottish local elections
title: 1988 Kirkcaldy District Council election
